speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, following my remarks and those of the Republican leader, there will be a period of morning business for an hour. Senators will be allowed to speak for 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided and controlled between the two leaders or their designees. The Republicans will control the first half, the majority controls the final half. Following morning business, the Senate will resume consideration of S. Con. Res. 70, the concurrent resolution on the budget, for debate only until the 12:30 recess for the caucus luncheons.
